column4: the iptables stuff is relatively mature. I'd suspect the hardware first...
interesting, I agree with dugger5688 then, suspect a kernel issue...
better throughput with PCI-e I thought, but really, 4th time lucky? Doesn't seem likely....
older hardware is, if anything, often better supported. Don't let me deter you, but I'll eat my hat if the problem goes away with a newer card...
